text.name: intro
text.if:
The goblin falls down, smashing her tits flat on the ground and crying softly from the pain. She looks up at you and sniffles.

text.name: prompt-sex
text.b: What do you do to her, and if anything, which of your body parts do you use?

text.b: You aren't horny enough to rape her, but your nipples ache with the desire to feed her your milk. Do you feed her milk or leave?

text.name: prompt-eggs
